Camden.Reading Terminal:
The Reading Terminal ( RED-ing) is a complex of buildings that includes the former Reading Railroad main station located in the Market East section of Center City in the city of Philadelphia, Pennsylvania, United States. It is composed of the Reading Terminal Headhouse, Trainshed, and Market.


== History ==


=== Construction ===
In 1889, the Reading Railroad decided to build a train depot, passenger station, and company headquarters on the corner of 12th and Market Streets.
